help: :small_blue_diamond: **/spin** - Allows you to spin the roulette
:small_blue_diamond: **/slot** - Allows you to spin the slot machine
:small_blue_diamond: **/rosh** - Allows you to play roshambo game
:small_blue_diamond: **/dice** - Allows you to roll the dice
:small_blue_diamond: **/memory** - Shows how much memory bot use
:small_blue_diamond: **/say** - Allows bot to repeat whatever you say
about: Modest BOT is in no way affiliated with any (?) Entertainment® or any Games
rules: **1.** Betting or gambling (asking players to pay for a chance to win something) is not allowed
**2.** Be civil. Bullying, racism, excessive profanity, sexual content, and abusive behavior are not allowed
If there is any betting or gambling, responsibility is not belongs to Modest
